languages.text: {n}Назракей не торопится отвечать — он пробует пальцами край своего клинка, пристально разглядывая Маражая.{/n} "Я прибыл, чтобы сделать из тебя урок, щенок. Наглядный урок в присутствии остальных членов твоего убогого кабала, ошметки которого Черное сердце милостиво приняло в свои ряды".

{n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."
languages.original_text: {n}Назракей не торопится отвечать — он пробует пальцами край своего клинка, пристально разглядывая Маражая.{/n} "Я прибыл, чтобы сделать из тебя урок, щенок. Наглядный урок в присутствии остальных членов твоего убогого кабала, ошметки которого Черное сердце милостиво приняло в свои ряды".

Make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei hat keine Eile, zu antworten. Er fährt mit dem Finger über die Kante seiner Klinge und blickt Marazhai intensiv an.{/n} "Ich bin gekommen, um Euch eine Lektion zu erteilen, Wurm. Um ein Exempel an Euch zu statuieren, im Beisein des Rests Eurer jämmerlichen Kabale, die das Schwarze Herz gnädigerweise in seine Reihen aufgenommen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei hat keine Eile, zu antworten. Er fährt mit dem Finger über die Kante seiner Klinge und blickt Marazhai intensiv an.{/n} "Ich bin gekommen, um Euch eine Lektion zu erteilen, Wurm. Um ein Exempel an Euch zu statuieren, im Beisein des Rests Eurer jämmerlichen Kabale, die das Schwarze Herz gnädigerweise in seine Reihen aufgenommen hat."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}纳札骸并没有急于回答。他将一根手指慢慢擦过刀刃边缘，死死地盯着玛拉斋。{/n}“我要给你个教训，小崽子。黑心阴谋团已经慷慨接纳了你可怜的阴谋团残党，我要在他们面前杀一儆百。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸并没有急于回答。他将一根手指慢慢擦过刀刃边缘，死死地盯着玛拉斋。{/n}“我要给你个教训，小崽子。黑心阴谋团已经慷慨接纳了你可怜的阴谋团残党，我要在他们面前杀一儆百。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei prend son temps pour répondre. Il fait glisser son doigt sur le fil de sa lame en dévisageant Marazhai d'un œil inquisiteur.{/n} « Je suis venu vous donner une leçon, vermine. Faire de vous un exemple devant les rescapés de votre minable Kabale, que le Cœur Noir a généreusement acceptés dans ses rangs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei prend son temps pour répondre. Il fait glisser son doigt sur le fil de sa lame en dévisageant Marazhai d'un œil inquisiteur.{/n} « Je suis venu vous donner une leçon, vermine. Faire de vous un exemple devant les rescapés de votre minable Kabale, que le Cœur Noir a généreusement acceptés dans ses rangs. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei responde con pausa, recorriendo con el dedo el filo de su espada y mirando fijamente a Marazhai.{/n} «He venido a darte una lección, cachorro. A convertirte en ejemplo delante del resto de tu Kábala condenada, a cuyos miembros ha acogido el Corazón Negro entre sus filas».
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei responde con pausa, recorriendo con el dedo el filo de su espada y mirando fijamente a Marazhai.{/n} «He venido a darte una lección, cachorro. A convertirte en ejemplo delante del resto de tu Kábala condenada, a cuyos miembros ha acogido el Corazón Negro entre sus filas».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイは指で刃をなぞりながら、じっとマラズハイ見つめたままゆっくりと答える。{/n}「お前に思い知らせるために来たんだ、若造よ。黒き心臓が寛大にもメンバーに受け入れてた、お前の陰謀団のズタボロな残党の目の前で、お前を見せしめにするためにな」
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイは指で刃をなぞりながら、じっとマラズハイ見つめたままゆっくりと答える。{/n}「お前に思い知らせるために来たんだ、若造よ。黒き心臓が寛大にもメンバーに受け入れてた、お前の陰謀団のズタボロな残党の目の前で、お前を見せしめにするためにな」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei, yanıt vermek için acele etmiyor. Bir parmağını kılıcının sırtında gezdirip Marazhai'ı dikkatle izliyor.{/n} "Sana ders vermeye geldim solucan. Kara Yürek'in cömertlik edip saflarına kabul ettiği ezik Kabalının artıklarına ibret olsun diye seni cezalandıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei is in no hurry to reply, running a finger along the edge of his blade and gazing intently at Marazhai.{/n} "I have come to teach you a lesson, whelp. To make an example out of you in the presence of the rest of your wretched Kabal, which the Black Heart has graciously accepted into its ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei yanıt vermek için acele etmiyor. Parmaklarının birini kılıcının keskin kısmında gezdiriyor ve Marazhai'ı dikkatle izliyor.{/n} "Sana bir ders vermeye geldim solucan. Kara Yürek'in cömertlik edip saflarına kabul ettiği ezik Kabal'ından geri kalanlara ibret olsun diye cezalandıracağım seni."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
